pre_approved.title: Great News! You May Be Pre-Approved
pre_approved.message: Based on the information you provided, you may qualify for pre-approval for your requested loan amount of ${loan_amount}. This is an exciting first step!
pre_approved.next_steps: An agent can contact you to finalize your application and discuss the next steps.

conditional.title: We'd Like to Learn More
conditional.message: Thank you for your interest in a loan of ${loan_amount}. Based on your financial profile, we'd like to review additional information with you to explore your options.
conditional.next_steps: One of our experienced loan specialists can contact you to discuss alternative loan amounts or gather additional details that may help with your application.

denied.title: Thank You for Your Interest
denied.message: Based on the information provided, the requested loan amount of ${loan_amount} exceeds what is typically approved for similar financial profiles at this time.
denied.next_steps: We encourage you to speak with one of our agents who can discuss other options that might be a better fit for your current situation.

denied_compliance.title: Unable to Process Request
denied_compliance.message: We're unable to process your loan request at this time due to our lending guidelines. The requested amount or credit profile falls outside our current approval criteria.
denied_compliance.next_steps: Please consider reaching out to one of our agents to discuss alternative financial solutions.

yes.title: Thank You!
yes.message: Your information has been submitted. One of our agents will contact you within 1-2 business days at {email}.

no.title: Thank You for Your Time
no.message: We appreciate your interest. If you change your mind, feel free to submit another application anytime.

errors.missing_fields: Please fill out all required fields.
errors.invalid_email: Please provide a valid email address.
errors.invalid_credit_score: Credit score must be between 300 and 850.
errors.invalid_loan_amount: Loan amount must be greater than $0.
errors.invalid_income: Annual income must be greater than $0.
errors.system_error: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.
